name: Observable Framework Alpine Node
onCreateCommand: echo 'Please wait for live pane ...' | sudo tee /usr/local/etc/vscode-dev-containers/first-run-notice.txt
updateContentCommand:
if [ $(find . -maxdepth  1 -type d ! -name . ! -name .devcontainer | wc -l) -eq 0 ];  then 
 mv .devcontainer .. && git clone "$target_repo" . && rm -rf .devcontainer && git clean -f -f &&  mv ../.devcontainer . && exit  0 
 else 
 echo Contents available && exit 0 
 fi
